notice.ch: 以每週5日，每天8小時共40小時

remark.ch: 以每週5日，每天8小時共40小時

goal.ch: 為提昇學習效果，培養學生專業技能與實作經驗，使學生畢業後更能符合產業界需求。
goal.en: In order to improve the learning effect, cultivate students‘ professional skills and practical experience, so that students can better meet the needs of the industry after graduation.

outline.ch:
產業實習課程分為兩種：「暑期專業實習」與「企業實習」，其實施方式分別如下。
暑期專業實習：由大二或大三學生參與，於每年七月初至九月初之暑假期間在校外實習單位進行。
企業實習：由大四學生參與，於每年九月至一月或二月至六月在校外實習單位進行。
outline.en:
There are two types of industrial internship courses: “Summer Professional Internship“ and “Enterprise Internship“. The implementation methods are as follows.
Summer professional internship: Participated by sophomores or juniors, it will be carried out in off-campus internship units during the summer vacation from the beginning of July to the beginning of September every year.
Enterprise Internship: Participated by senior students, it will be conducted in off-campus internship units from September to January or from February to June every year.

textbook.ch: 所有基礎與專業課程用書皆為參考書籍。
textbook.en: All basic and professional course books are reference books.

gradMethod.ch: 實習表現成績計算以實習單位主管考核成績佔 70％，學校輔導老師考核成績佔30％，共同核計之。
gradMethod.en: Internship performance results are calculated based on the assessment results of the supervisor of the internship unit accounting for 70％, and the assessment results of the school counselor accounting for 30％, which are jointly audited.
